Uses of Class
ezvcard.io.StreamWriter

  • Packages that use StreamWriter 
    Package Description
    ezvcard.io.json
    Contains classes that can read/write jCards (JSON-encoded vCards).
    ezvcard.io.text
    Contains classes that can read/write traditional, plain-text vCards.
    ezvcard.io.xml
    Contains classes that can read/write xCards (XML-encoded vCards).

    • Uses of StreamWriter in ezvcard.io.json

      Subclasses of StreamWriter in ezvcard.io.json 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JCardWriter
      Writes VCard objects to a JSON data stream (jCard format).

    • Uses of StreamWriter in ezvcard.io.text

      Subclasses of StreamWriter in ezvcard.io.text 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  VCardWriter
      Writes VCard objects to a plain-text vCard data stream.

    • Uses of StreamWriter in ezvcard.io.xml

      Subclasses of StreamWriter in ezvcard.io.xml 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  XCardDocument.XCardDocumentStreamWriter 
      class  XCardWriter
      Writes xCards (XML-encoded vCards) in a streaming fashion.
